Description: Key Accountabilities• Collect, store, count, and arrange cash received from various sources for QCB deposits and other requirements in order to facilitate efficient movement of cash ensuring compliance with defined policies and procedures.• Process cash for various purposes (ATMs/ Branches/ QCB deposits) in order to ensure error-free processing and high turnaround delivery of service.• Preparation of ATM Schedules for after office hour replenishments.• Assist in moving cash to various locations (ATMs/ Branches/QCB deposits) by carefully loading cash in ATM cassettes, arranging and sealing security bags and preparing necessary documents for deliveries.• Deliver/ receive sealed bags containing cash/ ATM cassettes to/ from service providers to ensure smooth movement of cash.Skills
